about_the_game:
Celebrate Inkbound’s 1.0 launch with the Rise of the Unbound Supporter Pack DLC. This cosmetics pack is the perfect way to level up your look and impress fellow party members. The DLC supports the future development of Inkbound, while also getting your hands on exclusive cosmetic upgrades.

The DLC Contains:

8 Legendary Aspect Cosmetic Sets

  • Magma Miner - Molten Foundry Set
  • Mosscloak - Forest's Veil Set
  • Clairvoyant - Royal Musketeer's Set
  • Weaver - Oni Shadow Set
  • Obelisk - Crimson Spike Set
  • Star Captain - Commander's Set
  • Godkeeper - Samurai Set
  • Chainbreaker - Paladin Set

The DLC content will be added to your cosmetic inventory after purchasing and entering the Atheneum or a run while online.

By buying this DLC, you are supporting us and the development of future updates and content. From everyone at Shiny Shoe, thank you!
detailed_description:
Celebrate Inkbound’s 1.0 launch with the Rise of the Unbound Supporter Pack DLC. This cosmetics pack is the perfect way to level up your look and impress fellow party members. The DLC supports the future development of Inkbound, while also getting your hands on exclusive cosmetic upgrades.

The DLC Contains:

8 Legendary Aspect Cosmetic Sets

  • Obelisk - Crimson Spike Set

The DLC content will be added to your cosmetic inventory after purchasing and entering the Atheneum or a run while online.

By buying this DLC, you are supporting us and the development of future updates and content. From everyone at Shiny Shoe, thank you!

short_description: The Rise of the Unbound Supporter Pack rewards your support with eight exclusive cosmetic sets to customize your look. It includes one set for each character class to enhance your journey through the world of Inkbound.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
